Huffman codes: 
 =111
,=10110
.=01011
H=10111
I=10001
a=1001
d=10000
e=001
g=1101
h=0100
i=10100
l=000
n=01010
o=011
r=1100
w=10101

Corpus used to create codes: Hello world, here I go again.
 Encoding the corpus itself: 10111001000000011111101010111100000100001011011101000011100001111100011111101011111100111011001101000101001011
             Another string: Hello world
     Encoding second string: 1011100100000001111110101011110000010000
String with unknown symbols: Hello world! never go
      Encoding third string: 1011100100000001111110101011110000010000-11101010001-00111001111101011
